questions.prompt: You are Bowser One, a training aircraft. You need to request permission from ATC to taxi to runway 27.
options: ATC, Bowser One, request taxi to runway two seven. Over.
Tower, this is Bowser One, we need to go to the runway.
Bowser One requesting taxi clearance.
ATC, Bowser One, taxi runway 27 please. Out.
questions.expectedSpokenAnswer: ATC, Bowser One, request taxi to runway two seven. Over.

questions.prompt: ATC has instructed you to hold short of runway 27. Acknowledge this instruction.
options: Holding short runway two seven. Over.
ATC, Bowser One, holding short runway two seven. Over.
Roger, will hold.
Bowser One copies, holding short. Out.
questions.expectedSpokenAnswer: Holding short runway two seven. Over.

questions.prompt: You didn't understand ATC's last transmission. Request clarification.
options: ATC, say again. Over.
What did you say?
ATC, Bowser One, request repeat. Over.
Bowser One, repeat please.

questions.prompt: You are Bowser One and have been cleared for takeoff on runway 27. Acknowledge the clearance.
options: ATC, Bowser One, cleared for takeoff runway two seven. Over.
Cleared takeoff. Out.
Roger, taking off.
Bowser One, runway two seven, cleared takeoff. Over.
questions.expectedSpokenAnswer: ATC, Bowser One, cleared for takeoff runway two seven. Over.

questions.prompt: You are Bowser One at 5000 feet and need to report your position to ATC.
options: ATC, Bowser One, five thousand feet, over the field. Over.
This is Bowser One, we're at 5000.
Bowser One at five thousand.
ATC, position report, five thousand. Out.
questions.expectedSpokenAnswer: ATC, Bowser One, five thousand feet, over the field. Over.

questions.prompt: ATC instructs you to descend to 3000 feet. Read back the instruction.
options: Descending to three thousand feet. Over.
ATC, Bowser One, descending to three thousand feet. Over.
Bowser One, three thousand, roger.
Wilco, going down to 3000.
questions.expectedSpokenAnswer: Descending to three thousand feet. Over.

questions.prompt: You are Bowser One and wish to declare a PAN-PAN situation due to a minor engine issue.
options: ATC, Bowser One, PAN-PAN, PAN-PAN, PAN-PAN, minor engine issue, request priority landing. Over.
Mayday, Mayday, engine problem.
ATC, we have an engine problem.
Bowser One declaring emergency.
questions.expectedSpokenAnswer: ATC, Bowser One, PAN-PAN, PAN-PAN, PAN-PAN, minor engine issue, request priority landing. Over.

questions.prompt: ATC clears you to land on runway 27. Acknowledge.
options: Cleared to land runway two seven. Over.
ATC, Bowser One, cleared to land runway two seven. Over.
Landing runway 27, thanks.
Bowser One will land. Out.
questions.expectedSpokenAnswer: Cleared to land runway two seven. Over.

questions.prompt: You have landed and vacated the runway. Report to ATC.
options: ATC, Bowser One, runway vacated. Over.
We're off the runway now.
Bowser One clear.
Runway clear, Bowser One. Out.
questions.expectedSpokenAnswer: ATC, Bowser One, runway vacated. Over.

questions.prompt: You are ending communications with ATC for this session.
options: ATC, Bowser One, switching off. Out.
Goodbye ATC.
Bowser One signing off.
That's all from us. Out.
questions.expectedSpokenAnswer: ATC, Bowser One, switching off. Out.
